mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (

AND WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.REGDATE LIKE #{startDate} || '%' -- 최종등록일
AND WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.REGDATE BETWEEN #{startDate} || '000000' AND #{endDate} || '999999' -- 최종등록일
AND WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.REGION LIKE '%' || #{region} || '%' -- 지역 AND WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.SITEID LIKE '%' || #{siteId} || '%' -- 사이트명 GROUP BY WEBROBOT_SITE.SITENM, WEBROBOT_SEED.SEEDNM, WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.DOCTYPE, WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.SEEDID, WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.SEEDURL ORDER BY MAX(WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.REGDATE) DESC
mapper.select: SELECT /* selectMetaExcelExportList */ WEBROBOT_SITE.SITENM, WEBROBOT_SEED.SEEDNM, MAX(WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.REGDATE) REGDATE_ORG, SUBSTR(MAX(WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.REGDATE),1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(MAX(WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.REGDATE),5,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(MAX(WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.REGDATE),7,2) REGDATE, ( SELECT DOCTYPE_NAME FROM OUTDOCTYPE WHERE DOCTYPE = WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.DOCTYPE) DOCTYPE_NAME, -- 자료유형, WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.SEEDID, -- 사이트ID, WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.SEEDURL -- 사이트URL FROM WEBROBOT_CONTENTS, WEBROBOT_SITE, WEBROBOT_SEED WHERE WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.SITEID = WEBROBOT_SITE.SITEID AND WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.SEEDID = WEBROBOT_SEED.SEEDID AND WEBROBOT_SITE.SITEID = WEBROBOT_SEED.SITEID AND WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.CUD_CODE != 'D' AND WEBROBOT_CONTENTS.DOCTYPE != '140'
